function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"The proximity of people in densely occupied spaces increases the risk of disease transmission by contact and droplet transmission despite the use of dilution ventilation.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Relocation diffusion of disease via global mobility","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Introduction of new technologies such as 6g, iot, and immersive xr may lead to an expansion of cashless economies, potentially influencing the spread of contagious diseases through the handling of cashless payments.","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Effects of evaporation on chemistry of droplets affecting virus stability","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Insufficient consideration of the impact of digital methodologies on public health","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Varied success in managing the burden of covid-19","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Exposure to virus at work","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Under-reporting of cases","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Age differences in the association between physical activity and psychological well-being during covid-19.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Expansi\\u00f3n del teletrabajo en latinoam\\u00e9rica","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium-high"}]}
